title: Priyanka Chopra showcases chic style in India as she continues long press tour for The Sky Is Pink
text:
She's spent the past nearly two weeks in her native country of India to promote her latest Bollywood flick, The Sky Is Pink.

And Priyanka Chopra Jonas continued her press tour on Saturday, spotted in the India's largest city, Mumbai.

The 37-year-old was seen rocking not one but two stellar ensembles, including a traditional saree, for the engagement.

Glamour queen! Priyanka Chopra showcased her enviable chic style when she stepped out in two looks in Mumbai on Saturday, amid promotion for her new movie, The Sky Is Pink

One look had Priyanka stun in a matching two-set which saw her opt for a strapless striped top.

Her top featured white, black and red panels and she steamed the look with a complimentary pair of trousers.

The actress completed her look with heeled closed-toe shoes.

Gorgeous: One look had Priyanka stun in a matching two-set which saw her opt for a strapless striped top

Matching: Her top featured white, black and red panels and she steamed the look with a complimentary pair of trousers

Priyanka styled her long brunette hair out into a sleek design and kept her makeup glamorous with a dark eye and bold red lip.

Later in the day, the wife of Nick Jonas was seen slipping into a traditional saree for a TV show appearance.

Her ensemble featured a red long sleeved top underneath a matching polka-dot design wrapped around her body.

Stunning: Priyanka styled her long brunette hair out into a sleek design and kept her makeup glamorous with a dark eye and bold red lip

Solo trip: Priyanka has been in India for the past 11 days without her husband, Nick Jonas

Priyanka slicked her dark hair back off of her face and kept her makeup similar for the appearance.

She was seen posing alongside her co-star, Farhan Akhtar, ahead of the show.

Speaking about her upcoming film, The Sky Is Pink, she told the Times of India that viewers should bring both their 'brain and heart' when watching the movie.

'This is a very special film based on a special real-life couple who thrive through extraordinary circumstances,' she began.

Back to her roots: Later in the day, the wife of Nick Jonas was seen slipping into a traditional saree for a TV show appearance

'I feel like in a cynical world today where we live our own lives, this film shows you what it can do when you have a family, family support.'

She continued: 'I feel like when I read the movie (script), that's when you know.. jumped out at me so much because my parents were like that.

'They were extremely supportive and that gave me the ability to be who I am and where I am today. You will need your brain and your heart.'

Priyanka has been in India for the past 11 days without her husband, Nick Jonas.

The Sky Is Pink will be released on October 11 in the USA.
